Posts.Content: Hi Rather similar than u , age 43 mum of 3 plus step mum of another may 2012 Told breast cancer , had mx and diep recon Some lymp nodes removed Found cancer in them too . I've just had fourth tax chemo could hardly face it did not want to do it again next one is 21 dec That sucks as will feel shit through Christmas . So buddy know what u feel , my life is not the same and don't feel will be ever again hard to do everything only thing keeps me completing is look on my kids faces when they get concerned when am ill If wanna chat that's good x
Posts.Title: Don't think I can do another round :(
